key.name: invert-horizontal-rotation-direction
key.description: Invert horizontal rotation direction of the screen

key.name: invert-vertical-rotation-direction
key.description: Invert vertical rotation direction of the screen

key.name: flip-orientation
key.description: Alter orientation. (e.g: Landscape to Portrait. Default is Landscape.)

key.name: orientation-offset
key.description: Experiment with this offset in case orientation is incorrect.

key.name: manual-flip
key.description: Enable a toggle in the GNOME Shell System Menu to manually flip between landscape and portrait.

key.name: landscape-osk
key.description: Enable the use of the On-Screen-Keyboard for the landscape orientation.

key.name: portrait-right-osk
key.description: Enable the use of the On-Screen-Keyboard for the portrait (right) orientation.

key.name: portrait-left-osk
key.description: Enable the use of the On-Screen-Keyboard for the portrait (left) orientation.

key.name: landscape-flipped-osk
key.description: Enable the use of the On-Screen-Keyboard for the landscape (flipped) orientation.
